column4: Hi, when I tried to update to Natty, I got following error. Can not mark xubunut-desktop for upgrade. http://i.imgur.com/ypYh2.png
Your error message clearly states at least 3 measures to take. Did you do all of them?
I didn't quite understand the causes. The last one might be the root of the problem as I did build some packages from source code. Removing them.
